doe,"2021-10-29T14:35:29.227Z","Better than the Dodge Charger","

The new Batmobile is superior to #42111 Dom'
2. It lights up in the dark.
3. It contains over 283 more LEGO pieces for the same price.
Other than that both sets are quite similar: both come in black, both are based on a Dodge, have the same price, are based on a movie which makes them
column2: licensed sets, are about the same size and&nbsp
column3: require the same building time and technical skill.

column1: I think the designer did a great job to capture the original design from the movie. It is a great set for kids to play with and
column2: I guess it will fit a Batman action figure perfectly. The Batmobile is&nbsp
column3: a good entry into the world of LEGO Technic not only for fans of the Dark Crusader.

column1:
,TRUE,4,4,2,4,4 Zoul","2022-04-12T10:26:42.007Z","My current favorite set! Well worth the retail!","

This set is an amazing one especially for the retail price point at 100 USD! Super complex build that took around 13-14 hours to build. 11 of those hours was in one sitting because of how much fun it was! I felt like I was actually building a real (but small) car due to the amazing work the Technics team put into it! The only bad thing I would say is there are a lot of similar parts, but I don'
column2: t recall the building process feeling too repetitive. A must-have for Batman fans looking for&nbsp
column3: a decorative piece for their home!!

column1:

It was a challenging build lots of details.
column2: lights are cool looking, but the front one is hard to activate once fully built.&nbsp
column4: I would like to see this model used with power functions.&nbsp
column5: maybe an option for the second one.&nbsp

column1:
,TRUE,5,5,5,3,3 Lungfish","2022-10-09T19:19:23.6Z","Fun to build, great interactivity, excellent value","

I found this on sale at a local retailer for $90CAD. At that price I should go back and buy a couple more, if only to level up my inventory of Technic parts.
Lots of fun to build over a couple of days. Some repetitive builds but I never got bored. A lot of fun to watch it all come together, and I can'
column4: it every so often. Lots to do and explore once built -- doors (naturally), the hood, two light features, &quot
column6: pistons, and an actual working differential gear to boot.

column1: Kudos to the design team who put this together. They'
column2: ve really captured the coolness and toughness of what I think is the best Batmobile ever.
